classes

Class King

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.Piece
      • classes.King

  • public class King
extends Piece
    The King class represents the king piece. It can move/attack in space in any directly adjacent space.
    Author:
    Evan Loriot, Joseph Klaszky

      • isLegal

        public boolean isLegal(Piece[][] board,
                       java.lang.String command,
                       java.lang.String color,
                       boolean canPrint)
        This method takes a look at the current board and the user's move to see if this would be a legal move.
        Parameters:
        board - the current set up of the game board
        command - gotten from user input
        color - color of the current user's pieces
        canPrint - true if illegal moves are allowed to be printed
        Returns:
        true if the entered move is legal, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - -- if the user enters badly formatted input.
        See Also:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException

        Performs superclass move and castling if applicable

        move in class Piece
        Parameters:
        board - current setup of chess board
        move - move to be done
